title: Writing About Your Hobbies
description: Write about your hobbies and explain why you enjoy them.

prompt.description: Write about one or two hobbies that you enjoy. Explain what you do, how often you do it, and why you like it.
requirements: Explain what you do when practicing this hobby
Say how often you do this activity
Use gerunds (-ing) and infinitives (to + verb) correctly

exampleSentences.translation: 제가 가장 좋아하는 취미는 사진 촬영이에요.

exampleSentences.sentence: I enjoy taking pictures of nature and landscapes.
exampleSentences.translation: 자연과 풍경 사진 찍는 것을 즐겨요.
exampleSentences.useCase: To describe what you do (gerund after 'enjoy')

exampleSentences.sentence: I practice about three times a week.
I started learning this hobby two years ago.
exampleSentences.useCase: To talk about when you started

exampleSentences.sentence: It helps me relax after a busy day.
exampleSentences.translation: 바쁜 하루 후에 휴식을 취하는 데 도움이 돼요.

exampleSentences.sentence: I want to improve my skills even more.
exampleSentences.useCase: To talk about future goals (infinitive after 'want')

vocabularyHelp.example: I want to improve my skills.

usefulExpressions.usage: To say how long you've had this hobby
usefulExpressions.example: I've been doing photography for two years.

usefulExpressions.usage: To explain the benefit of your hobby
To highlight what you like most
usefulExpressions.example: The best thing about painting is being creative.

usefulExpressions.expression: I would recommend... to anyone who...
usefulExpressions.usage: To recommend your hobby to others
usefulExpressions.example: I would recommend yoga to anyone who wants to relax.

items: Did you clearly name your hobby/hobbies?
Did you explain what you do when practicing?
Did you mention how often you do this activity?
Did you explain why you enjoy it?
Did you share any benefits of this hobby?
Did you use infinitives (to + verb) correctly?
Did you use the correct verb forms?
Did you vary your sentence structures?
Is your writing at least 80 words?
Is your writing no more than 120 words?
Are your sentences a good length?
Is your description clear and interesting?
Did you show enthusiasm for your hobby?
Did you complete within the time limit?
